publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Flying Horse betweene York-house and Britaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: The title page has imprimatur on verso. With an additional title page, inserted after L1, with prologues on verso. The insert was presumably printed as leaf O2.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
